page.title: 18The Needs of Young People
page.content: The age group 10 - 19 is poorly served despite there being brass band, choir, scouts & guides taking place in the evenings. What is required is a permanent meeting place open every evening where young people can chat, listen to records or just do nothing in the warm and dry. A youth centre would be super but a coffee bar would do. Most of us don't want to join organisations and have things we've "Got to do". Some people like the idea of a BMX track, but this would only be for daylight hours and anyway, BMX might only last a year or two, like the last craze.. skateboarding.
